value:
$bEvBg_Chapter3_Hell|$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Yaaahhh!$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Eir!$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Líf, please! I have no wish to
fight you!$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|I have cause even if you do not.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|You...what? What happened to the
woman who accompanied you?$k$pThrasir, wasn't it? You two seemed
to always travel together...$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|...She and I were freed from the
realm of the dead when Hel
was defeated.$k$pBut there is a new ruler: Ganglöt.$k$pAnd we dead are now under
her command. Nothing more.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|No... It can't be...$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|Once made, a contract with the ruler
of the dead can never be broken.$k$pThe higher powers, with whom I've
made another bargain, may see fit
to issue conflicting commands...$k$pIn which case, it will likely be the
end of me.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|What are you saying?$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|Forget it. But know that Thrasir and
I cannot allow ourselves to disappear
from this world just yet.$k$pAnd so, Princess Eir...I must take
your life. I am sorry.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Wait! I have something I must say!
Please, listen!$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Eir. In your current condition, you
are no match for him, and he will
almost certainly kill you.$k$pRelease the power that I have
granted you. Use that power
to stop him!$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|

$bEvBg_Chapter3_Hell|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|Gah!$k$pI did not expect you to put up
such a fight.$k$pYou are...different from the Princess
Eir I knew. What has changed?$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|Just as Ganglöt granted you new
power, so too have I been granted
a strength beyond my own.$k$pPlease, withdraw.$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|I...cannot.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|I know you have a kind heart...
You were once the same person
as the Alfonse I know...$k$pI do not believe you would fight
solely for yourself, so...you must
be fighting for Thrasir.$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|Let me face Ganglöt. I will defeat
her and free you from her grasp.$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Eir! That will no—$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|Líf and Thrasir are where they
are because of Mother...$k$pI cannot absolve myself of all
responsibility for what happened
to them...$k$pLíf, you can trust me. I will make
certain you are both freed.$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|...You do not understand the
promise you're making. Ganglöt
has inherited all of Hel's power.$k$pIn terms of the number of dead she
commands, she no doubt surpasses
her former master.$k$pWhat faith can I possibly have that
you will succeed?$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|I want to free the two of you from
her control...$k$pBut not only that—I want to free
the former denizens of the realm
of life as well.$k$pTo achieve that goal, there is no
getting around a confrontation
with Ganglöt.$k$pYou need not wait long.$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|You...are a completely different
Eir than the one I once knew.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|If I am different, my growth is all
due to Prince Alfon—due to you.$k$pThat is how I kept on living. Together
with $Nu, they...$k$pEveryone around me helped
me keep going.$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|...$k$pI can allow you one day.
No more.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|Oh! Thank you, Líf... You will not
regret this!$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Eir...$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|I am sorry for acting selfishly, Ymir.$k$pThough I am a princess of the realm
of life, I am...also a daughter of the
realm of the dead's ruler.$k$pI cannot abandon them...$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|I understand. This is the type
of person you are. No matter what
comes, I will support you.$k$pTogether, we can surely attain
victory over Ganglöt.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|Thank you, Ymir... I am so glad
to have you with me in this.$k$p

$WmMPID_比翼ドーマ,ch10_18_Duma_MF_Pair,Face|Hmm... It seems that every child
runs from me as I approach. It has
happened too often to be chance.$k$pI may be ill suited for this festival
after all. You should go on without
me, Mila.$k$p$nMPID_神階ミラ|I will do nothing of the sort, Brother.
We are meant to spend this time
together, in celebration.$k$pIs it so surprising that children would
flee at the sight of a dragon such
as yourself?$k$pI suspect not everyone will flee
from you though...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|What makes you so sure?$k$p$nMPID_神階ミラ|There may be only few, but there
are those in this world with whom
I am familiar.$k$pThey do not fear me, so they should
have no fear of you either. Let's go
see them. Follow me!$k$p

$WmMPID_ボーイ,ch10_12_Boowy_M_Normal,Face|Oh... Uh... Trick or— You know what?
Just treat! Treat or treat? Do you...
like treats?$k$p...Don't hurt me!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ドーマ,ch10_18_Duma_MF_Pair,Face|Well done. Here, a treat for you.
For your courage.$k$p$WmMPID_ボーイ,ch10_12_Boowy_M_Normal,Face|I, um... Thank you, sir!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ミラ,ch10_18_Duma_MF_Pair,Face|Well done. Look how happy you
made him, Brother!$k$pNow, your turn, young lady.$k$p$WmMPID_メイ,ch10_16_May_F_Normal,Face|M-me? I, uhh...$k$pPsst! Celica! Do we really have to
do this?! I'm not sure it's such
a good idea!$k$p$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_Normal,Face|We received an invitation from the
Earth Mother herself! O-of course
it's a fine idea.$k$p$WmMPID_メイ,ch10_16_May_F_Normal,Face|I'm fine with the Earth Mother,
but why is Duma there?$k$pWho knows what he's up to?!$k$p$WmMPID_ボーイ,ch10_12_Boowy_M_Normal,Face|Ugh, my heart is beating faster
than that time we ran into that
group of necrodragons...$k$pWhy do we have to go through this?
Haven't we suffered enough? If we
didn't have to go through it alo—$k$pYou know what? I'm going to gather
everyone I know from Valentia.
I'll be right back!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ミラ,ch10_18_Duma_MF_Pair,Face|Did you hear, Brother? That boy is
bringing more trick-or-treaters.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|Let them come! Let them see that
ours was the greatest harvest festival
of them all!$k$p
